entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening. Local amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h early in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 6:42 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
